ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of GAIL ASPER, O.C., O.M., of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
